summary: Senior Frontend Developer with over 10 years of experience architecting and delivering scalable web applications. Specialized in React, TypeScript, and modern frontend architecture with a proven track record of leading cross-functional teams and shipping high-impact features at companies including Wix and 1stDibs.

projects.title: Blog
projects.description: Developed AI-powered features including automated post generation and intelligent assistants for content categorization and tagging. Elevated code quality by driving migration to TypeScript and adopting modern state management patterns. Contributed to cross-team initiatives across multiple Wix products.

projects.title: Frontend Developer
projects.description: Developed customer-facing applications including a self-service optical portal, omnichannel communication tools with SMS and email integration, and a real-time messaging system powered by WebSockets. Architected a monorepo infrastructure for managing shared packages across frontend applications with automated build, deployment, and publishing pipelines.
achievements: Designed and built a self-service optical portal enabling users to measure pupillary distance and order prescription lenses
Developed an omnichannel communication interface integrating SMS and email outreach capabilities
Engineered a real-time chat system leveraging WebSockets for instant notifications and persistent message history
Architected a monorepo infrastructure using Lerna with conventional commits to ensure semantic versioning accuracy across packages
projects.tools: React, React-Query, TypeScript, Redux, MUI, EmotionJS, Web Sockets, Lerna, Rollup, GitHub Actions, Jest

projects.title: Growth (SEO)
projects.description: Drove organic growth by implementing on-page and off-page SEO strategies to improve search engine rankings, reduce bounce rates, and enhance user engagement through programmatically generated content.
achievements: Implemented data-driven strategies that contributed to measurable organic traffic growth
Built internal tooling for SEO configuration, auditing, and performance optimization
Migrated the Q&A platform from WordPress to a modern React, Relay, and GraphQL architecture
projects.tools: React, GraphQL, Relay, Redux, TypeScript, Express.js, Fastify

projects.title: User Onboarding / Personalized Experience
projects.description: Led a strategic initiative to increase user acquisition and collect preference data to deliver personalized experiences across product pricing, categories, and verticals.
achievements: Designed and launched a streamlined email-only registration flow to reduce sign-up friction
Built an interactive onboarding questionnaire to tailor content and recommendations based on user preferences
Redesigned the onboarding experience to improve new user activation and engagement
projects.tools: React, GraphQL, Relay, Redux, TypeScript, Express.js, Fastify

projects.title: Internationalization and Localization
projects.description: Internationalized and localized the buyer-facing web application to support expansion into European markets. Built an automated translation pipeline serving regional domains (fr, co.uk, de).
achievements: Led the full localization of the buyer-facing 1stDibs platform
Built an automated translation pipeline supporting American English to German, French, and British English
Implemented domain-based locale routing to ensure region-appropriate content delivery
projects.tools: React-Intl, React, GraphQL, Relay, Express.js, Nginx

projects.title: Search & Browse, Product Page Refactoring
projects.description: Rebuilt search, browse, and product detail pages using React, Relay, and GraphQL, migrating from a legacy PHP codebase. Optimized the interface for mobile devices and delivered a mobile-first application experience.
achievements: Rewrote core search and browse pages, migrating from PHP to React, Relay, and GraphQL
Optimized the interface for mobile performance and usability
Delivered a mobile-first application version aligned with responsive design best practices
Completed full migration to the modern stack with a refreshed UI across all pages
projects.tools: React, Relay, TypeScript, GraphQL, Lodash, Express.js

projects.title: Styleguide Driven Development
projects.description: Established and maintained a comprehensive style guide for the UI component library, ensuring UX consistency across 18 products developed by multiple teams. Provided technical guidance and training to developers on library adoption and implementation.
achievements: Authored documentation and developed reusable UI modules adopted across multiple product teams
Maintained a unified UI/UX standard across the platform through continuous updates and quality reviews
Led presentations and hands-on training sessions to onboard developers on UI library adoption and best practices
projects.tools: Web Components, Node.js, jQuery, Backbone.js, JavaScript

projects.title: UI Library for Internal Products
projects.description: Maintained and enhanced the organization-wide UI component library. Developed and iterated on core UI components, provided cross-team implementation support, and resolved component-level defects.
achievements: Developed and maintained core UI components including datepicker, data grid, and multi-select controls
Authored component documentation and provided hands-on integration support to product teams
Triaged and resolved component defects to maintain library reliability and stability
projects.tools: HTML5, Vanilla JavaScript, jQuery, Backbone.js, Lodash, Styleguide Driven Development

projects.title: HTML5 Interactive Banners
projects.description: Developed interactive HTML5 ad units for major European and UK publishers, with a focus on responsive, mobile-first design. Partnered with clients to prototype custom designs and animations.
achievements: Delivered interactive rich-media ad units for premium publishers including Aftonbladet and Sky
Partnered with clients to prototype and iterate on custom ad designs and animations
Optimized asset delivery by reducing file sizes for video and images without compromising quality, and integrated analytics to measure performance and inform future iterations
